name: floral-healing
effect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP.  If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.

max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
